info.name: Facebook Background Generator (TARDIS)
info.description: The T.A.R.D.I.S. background generator for my Black Facebook theme. Choose from six different wallpapers, and override the theme's plain black background. The style replaces also the F in the nav bar with a DW logo. pfeiffer stylez is also on Facebook.
info.additionalInfo: This is not a stand-alone style, just the background. You'll also need the Black Facebook theme to get what you see in the preview images.

options.label: one
options.value: background: #000 url("http://i.imgur.com/dsTuoat.jpg") center center no-repeat fixed !important; background-size: cover !important;
